Validation Mode
skills.pattern:
useForm({
  mode: 'onSubmit',    // Validate on submit (default)
  mode: 'onChange',    // Validate on change
  mode: 'onBlur',      // Validate on blur
  mode: 'onTouched',   // Validate on first blur, then onChange
  mode: 'all'          // Validate on blur and change
})

skills.name: Watch Fields
Set Values
Get Values
Form State
skills.pattern:
const { formState } = useForm();

formState.isDirty      // Any field changed
formState.isValid      // Form is valid
formState.isSubmitting // Submit in progress
formState.isSubmitted  // Form submitted
formState.submitCount  // Number of submits
formState.errors       // All errors
formState.dirtyFields  // Changed fields
formState.touchedFields // Touched fields

skills.pattern:
<input
  type="file"
  {...register('files', {
    validate: (files) => {
      if (files[0]?.size > 1000000) {
        return 'Max 1MB';
      }
      return true;
    }
  })}
/>

skills.name: Material UI
skills.pattern:
<Controller
  name="select"
  control={control}
  render={({ field }) => (
    <TextField
      {...field}
      select
      label="Select"
      error={!!errors.select}
      helperText={errors.select?.message}
    >
      <MenuItem value="1">Option 1</MenuItem>
    </TextField>
  )}
/>
